      • GameMode

        java.lang.String GameMode
        String holds what gamemode a user is playing. Gamemodes are chess, chessboxing, or boxing.

      • UserRole

        java.lang.String UserRole
        String holds the user's player type. Player type Player1, Player2, or Spectator.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in ComponentActivity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null. Loads boxing screen onto device. Displays starting health, opposing player's username, and other information.
